  • Uses of ValidationException in exception

    Subclasses of ValidationException in exception
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    EmptyFieldException
    EmptyFieldException extends our custom ValidatioNException, this exception is thrown when the user does not input some data into an input field
    class 
    InvalidEmailException
    InvalidEmailException extends our custom ValidatioNException, this exception is thrown when the user enters invalid data into an email text field
    class 
    PasswordInconsistentException
    PasswordInconsistentException extends our custom ValidatioNException, this exception is thrown when the user attempts to change password, but the new password and confirm password fields do not match, or if the user does not input the correct old password
